sankey.comments:
same as sankey1, but another parallel axis, which makes vectors doubled
    - a comparation to clearify flow v.s. vectors. see docsphinx/design-memo/003-sankey-vectors.png

bars.g-desc: grid index, z always 0 (at parallel coordinates)
bars.y_ex-desc: VIRTUAL y grid index at z=1, ... . If grid-y = 4, max-y = 2, y1(0) = 0, y1(1) = 1, y2(2) = 2, see xmath/Grid
